name: County Offices to Close for Labor Day
description: County of San Diego offices will be closed Monday, Sept. 6, in observance of Labor Day.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent:
County of San Diego offices will be closed Monday, Sept. 6, in observance of Labor Day.
County libraries and animal shelters will also be closed. In addition, the Registrar of Voters, which has been open for early voting, and all 131 mail ballot drop-off locations will be closed for the holiday.
Essential services including law enforcement and emergency animal services will continue.
County parks and campgrounds will be open except for the following centers, which will be closed for the day:

Fallbrook Community Center
Lakeside Community Center
Lakeside Teen Center/Rec Club
Spring Valley Gym
Spring Valley Community Center
Spring Valley Teen Center/Rec Club
4S Ranch Sports Park Office

County offices will resume regular business hours on Tuesday, Sept. 7.
